ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Defence_Space__c = True, ISBLANK( Case__c ), left( $Profile.Name, 11) = 'eGreensheet', $Profile.Name <> 'eGreensheet Approver', $User.Username <> 'eGreenApprovalprocess Site Guest User', NOT( Opportunity_Proposal_Create_Date__c < date(2014,1,1) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Case is required for D&S eGreensheet
